name: Do You Know The Way?
description:
!! We recommend using the  itch.io app for windows. That way your game will be up to date. !!

You play as Oliver, a former dutch soldier. Your goal is to find the hidden artifact and bring it back to Steve. You are doing this by completing levels full of Enemies, Parkour and Puzzels! Complete 18 Unique levels in this 2d platform shooter!

This game took about 7 Months to create and this is my first complete game, i hope you enjoy!

DEMO IS NOW AVAILABLE! Play the first 3 levels and see the game for yourself!

We recommend that you download our game using the itch.io app! So the game stays up to date.

System reqs:

- Minimum 100mb storage

- Intel core i3 or higher

- Integrated Graphics or higher 

FOUND BUGS?

This game is in early release, so if you find bugs that i have overseen please contact me as soon as possible so i can fix the bug.

READ DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE INSTALLING
